text: I just posted a poll on LinkedIn to gather insights about how people are managing usage-based SaaS subscriptions in HubSpot. I’d love to hear from this community as well!  <https://www.linkedin.com/posts/activity-7243637492380286977-hWRI?utm_source=share&utm_medium=member_desktop>

:rocket: We’re Hiring a Remote HubSpot CRM

Are you passionate about optimizing lead management and enhancing team performance?

We’re excited to announce one of our clients has a 3 months full-time open position, where you’ll play a key role in leveraging HubSpot CRM and driving our inbound lead strategies.

What You’ll Do:
-Configure HubSpot CRM for effective lead management and reporting.
- Source and onboard additional resources.
- Set up lead ingestion, assignment rules, and pipelines.
- Deliver sessions on lead qualification and engagement.
- Conduct daily check-ins and coach team members.

*Apply*
